title: Quarkus 2.16.8.Final released - Maintenance release
content: As mentioned in previous blog posts, we encourage all our users to upgrade to Quarkus 3. However we understand the migration can require some time so we will continue to maintain 2.16.x for a while. Today, we released Quarkus 2.16.8.Final, the eighth maintenance release of our 2.16 release train. As...
